headline.main: Dzeko Scores Two as Roma Beat Napoli, Juve Win Again
headline.print_headline: Dzeko Scores Two as Roma Beat Napoli, Juve Win Again

docs.snippet: Edin Dzeko scored twice to set up a 3-1 win for AS Roma away to Napoli in the battle for second place in Serie A on Saturday and Paulo Dybala also notched up a brace for leaders Juventus in their 2-1 win over Udinese....
docs.lead_paragraph: Edin Dzeko scored twice to set up a 3-1 win for AS Roma away to Napoli in the battle for second place in Serie A on Saturday and Paulo Dybala also notched up a brace for leaders Juventus in their 2-1 win over Udinese.

headline.main: Merkel Says Germany to Give Big Boost to Defense Spending
headline.print_headline: Merkel Says Germany to Give Big Boost to Defense Spending

docs.snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Saturday that Europe's largest economy would significantly boost defense spending in the coming years to move towards the NATO target for member states to spend 2 percent of their economic output on defense....
docs.lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Saturday that Europe's largest economy would significantly boost defense spending in the coming years to move towards the NATO target for member states to spend 2 percent of their economic output on defense.

headline.main: A Linguist Who Cracks the Code in Names to Predict Ethnicity

docs.snippet: Lisa Spira is director of research and product development at Ethnic Technologies, which determines ethnic origins of prospective customers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lisa Spira is director of research and product development at Ethnic Technologies, which determines ethnic origins of prospective customers.

headline.main: Police: Man Rushing to Hospital to See Dad Crashes, 2 Killed
headline.print_headline: Police: Man Rushing to Hospital to See Dad Crashes, 2 Killed

docs.snippet: A motorist, apparently rushing to a Philadelphia hospital to see his injured father, ran a red light, was hit by an SUV and crashed into a utility pole, resulting in the deaths of his two passengers, authorities say....
docs.lead_paragraph: A motorist, apparently rushing to a Philadelphia hospital to see his injured father, ran a red light, was hit by an SUV and crashed into a utility pole, resulting in the deaths of his two passengers, authorities say.

headline.main: Your Phone’s on Lockdown. Enjoy the Show.
headline.print_headline: No Phones Allowed. Enjoy the Show.

docs.snippet: Yondr, a lockable pouch, holds fans’ cellphones during a performance, making it impossible to take photographs, shoot videos or send text messages....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yondr, a lockable pouch, holds fans’ cellphones during a performance, making it impossible to take photographs, shoot videos or send text messages.

headline.main: Alitalia Bans Samsung Galaxy Note 7 Phones From Flights
headline.print_headline: Alitalia Bans Samsung Galaxy Note 7 Phones From Flights

docs.snippet: Italy's flagship airline Alitalia has banned the Samsung Galaxy Note 7 smartphone on all flights effective immediately, following an emergency order prohibiting the phone on flights in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's flagship airline Alitalia has banned the Samsung Galaxy Note 7 smartphone on all flights effective immediately, following an emergency order prohibiting the phone on flights in the United States.

headline.main: South Florida Football Coach Gunned Down at Practice
headline.print_headline: South Florida Football Coach Gunned Down at Practice

docs.snippet: A volunteer youth-football league coach was gunned down just moments after he had brought cookies and Gatorade to his team after a practice at a Fort Lauderdale park....
docs.lead_paragraph: A volunteer youth-football league coach was gunned down just moments after he had brought cookies and Gatorade to his team after a practice at a Fort Lauderdale park.

docs.snippet: In a story Oct. 15 about a recall of defective tires made by GITI Tire and Continental Tire, The Associated Press reported erroneously that it affected about 265,000 vehicles. The recall affects about 265,000 tires, not vehicles....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Oct. 15 about a recall of defective tires made by GITI Tire and Continental Tire, The Associated Press reported erroneously that it affected about 265,000 vehicles. The recall affects about 265,000 tires, not vehicles.

headline.main: Banco Popolare, BPM Shareholders Back Creation of Italy's Third Biggest Bank
headline.print_headline: Banco Popolare, BPM Shareholders Back Creation of Italy's Third Biggest Bank

docs.snippet: The shareholders of Banca Popolare di Milano (BPM) and Banco Popolare approved a merger between the two lenders on Saturday, giving the final green light to the creation of Italy's third-largest bank by assets....
docs.lead_paragraph: The shareholders of Banca Popolare di Milano (BPM) and Banco Popolare approved a merger between the two lenders on Saturday, giving the final green light to the creation of Italy's third-largest bank by assets.

headline.main: Investors Anxious as Oregonians Again Vote on Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Investors Anxious as Oregonians Again Vote on Marijuana

docs.snippet: Last year, Golden Leaf Holdings, a leading cannabis company, paid $3.3 million for almost 100 acres of land in Oregon to build a marijuana growing, processing and research site....
docs.lead_paragraph: Last year, Golden Leaf Holdings, a leading cannabis company, paid $3.3 million for almost 100 acres of land in Oregon to build a marijuana growing, processing and research site.
